scripts.build: npm run -w @tarot/game-logger build && npm run -w @tarot/game-sim build && npm run -w @tarot/db build && npm run -w @tarot/ws-stub build && npm run -w @tarot/web build && npm run -w @tarot/docs build
scripts.test: npm run -w @tarot/game-sim test && echo 'Run web E2E locally with: npm run -w @tarot/web dev & npx -w @tarot/web playwright test'
scripts.export: cd clients/godot/project && godot --headless --export-release Web && mkdir -p ../../../apps/web/public/godot && cp -r builds/web/* ../../../apps/web/public/godot/
